Tanks

类 Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a level in the Tanks game.

    • 字段概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Level

        public Level(Chara[][] layout,
             int[] foregroundColor,
             processing.core.PImage backgroundImage,
             processing.core.PImage treeImage,
             processing.core.PImage parachuteImage)
        Constructs a Level object.
        参数:
        layout - the layout of the level
        foregroundColor - the foreground color of the level
        backgroundImage - the background image of the level
        treeImage - the tree image of the level
        parachuteImage - the parachute image of the level
